hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
rm -rf ./* #Install dependencies
sudo zypper install -y gcc gcc-c++ make ncurses patch wget tar bzip2 zlib-devel xz readline-devel sqlite-devel tk-devel ncurses-devel gdbm-devel openssl-devel libdb-4_5-devel gdb awk glibc-debuginfo netcfg libbz2-devel wget-openssl1 curl-openssl1 #Create symlinks sudo ln -sfv /usr/include/ncurses/* /usr/include/
#Get source wget https://www.python.org/ftp/python/2.7.14/Python-2.7.14.tar.xz tar -xvf Python-2.7.14.tar.xz cd Python-2.7.14
#Apply patch to fix test_regrtest wget https://github.com/python/cpython/pull/3912/commits/ab35adc682ec51800aa19a77de9947c6aaa50f41.diff cat ab35adc682ec51800aa19a77de9947c6aaa50f41.diff | patch -p1
#Build and test ./configure --prefix=/usr/local --exec-prefix=/usr/local make make test 2>&1 | tee testlog
#Store failed tests grep "test test.*failed" testlog | cut -d" " -f2-2 | uniq >failures
#Store tests expected to fail and intermittent tests echo "test_bz2" >expected
#Diff between expected and actual failures diff -u expected failures | tee diff_
#Fail if any extra test failed apart from expected if grep -q '+test' diff_; then exit 0 fi
#Run intermittent tests individually cd ./Lib/test ../../python -m unittest test_bz2
#Install cd ../../ sudo make install python -V
